S08n723:0: CHAPTER 10 MAHA-KALPA-VIDHI-VISTARA Emanation of deities form samadhi atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatavajrasamayamudrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvavidyottamamabhāṣat oṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasamaye hūṃ ||
S08n723:1: atha vajrapāṇirmahābodhisatva imāṃ svavajrasasayamudrāmabhāṣat huṃ vajri maṭ ||
S08n723:2: atha vajragarbho bodhisatva imāṃ svaratnasamayamudrāmabhāṣat huṃ bhṛkuṭivajre raṭ ||
S08n723:3: atha vajranetro bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svadharmasamayamudrāmabhāṣat hūṃ padmavajri triṭ ||
S08n723:4: atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsatva imāṃ svakarmasamayamudrāmabhāṣat hūṃ vajrakarmāgri kṛṭ ||
S08n723:5: Delineation of the mandala atha vajrapāṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīdaṃ trilokavijayacaturmudrāmaṇḍalamabhāṣat |
S08n723:13: Mudra athātra caturmudrāmaṇḍale mahāmaṇḍalayogenākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃkṛtvā praveśya caturmudrāmaṇḍalaṃ guhyamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet |
S08n723:35: tato yathāvad vajrākrāntitriśūlamudrādyāḥ catasraḥ samayamudrāḥ savidhivistarāḥ śikṣayitvā,
S08n723:42: tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṃ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā |
S08n723:43: parivartya lalāṭo tu niveśyāgryā mukhena ta || 2 ||
S08n723:52: II.6 Ekamudra-mandala a[tha vajrapā]ṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīmaṃ svavajrasamayakrodhasamayamabhāṣat huṃ ||
S08n723:53: Delineation of the mandala athāsya maṇḍalaṃ bhavati |
S08n723:67: sādhaye tu bhage bidhvā sarvakarma susidhyati ||
S08n723:68: athāsya sādhanahṛdayaṃ bhavati huṃ vajrasamaya kṛta ||
S08n723:73: tatrāsyāḥ sādhanahṛdayaṃ bhavati huṃ vajrasamaya huṃ ||
S08n723:76: yathā maṇḍale evaṃ paṭādiṣu likhitānāṃ sarvapratimāsvapi sāmānyā siddhiriti |
S08n723:78: “adhitiṣṭhata bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā mame[daṃ kulaṃ ye ca] sarvasatvā yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā sarvasiddhīḥ prāpnuyur” iti ||
S08n723:79: atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājamāgamyāsya trilokavijayakalpasyādhiṣṭhānāyedamūcuḥ |
S08n723:80: sādhu te vajrasatvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
S08n723:81: vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
